morphInfos.tenseExplained: it happens (Aorist Imperative does not indicating any tense)
morphInfos.voiceExplained: it is something done to one
morphInfos.moodExplained: saying that an action should or must happen
morphInfos.personExplained: they are the person being spoken or written to
morphInfos.numberExplained: there is only one of them
morphInfos.explanation: an action that certainly is done to a person being spoken or written to
